item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi! I’m Yichi (Essie) Zhang, a data scientist with a strong foundation in statistics, machine learning, and business analytics. I thrive on using data to solve real-world problems, communicate insights, and support decision-making across diverse industries including retail, FMCG, real estate, and e-commerce.

With a Master of Data Science from the University of British Columbia (expected July 2025) and an MS in Business Analytics from Boston University, I’ve worked on projects ranging from demand forecasting and dashboard design to customer behavior analysis and ad tracking.

item.title: DataMop: A Python Package for Streamlined EDA
item.description: A Python package designed to simplify and standardize exploratory data analysis (EDA) workflows for data scientists and analysts.

item.title: Mushroom Classifier: Predicting Edibility from Morphological Features
item.description: A machine learning model that classifies mushrooms as edible or poisonous based on their physical characteristics.

item.title: Projects
item.description: A collection of data science and analytics projects I’ve worked on.

item.description: A React-based dashboard for exploring Vancouverâ€™s crime, housing, and traffic patterns interactively.
